page.title: 09A SCHOOL PUPIL'S TYPICAL DAY
page.content:
{ {A Day in the Life of Carolyn
Thursdays I wake up at 7:30am.I prepare for school and have a cereal breakfast.At 8:30 mother drives me one mile to school.School starts at 9:00am and ends at 3:30 with an hour break at lunch time at 12:00 I have sandwiches others have school lunches.Morning assembly is followed by lessons : Maths.,English,Welsh,Science,Geography History,Games. On arriving home I have a snack and watch Children's Television.Dinner is at 5:00.At 5:45 I go for piano lessons until 6:30.On returning home I prepare for bed and watch television or play cards with the family until 9:00.When it is bed time I read books in bed until 9:20pm then I go to sleep.
